A lightweight Python library to **minimize LLM token usage** before sending prompts to GPT, Claude, Mistral, etc.  

## âœ¨ Features
- **Text Cleaning** â†’ collapse whitespace, normalize newlines.
- **JSON Minify** â†’ compact JSON to reduce tokens.
- **Entity Compression** â†’ replace long repeated names with short placeholders.
